channel.title: Projects on PRASUN NASKAR
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on PRASUN NASKAR

item.title: (Project 1: Financial Analysis) Analyze the Pandemic Stock Market & Predict Stock price
item.description: Collected S&P stock history data from tiilingo(financial data platform) using free api key. Analysed the effect of GAFAM on S&P stock, used graphical representation. Applied some ml models, did statistical analysis. After that LSTM was found out to be the best-fit model. This Project’s GitHub Repository

item.title: (Project 2: Social Application) 25 Days Lockdown Air Quality Data analysis & aiq index prediction in Kolkata
item.description: Collected real-time data & historical data from cpcb , plotted city map using cartopy package. plotted a graph, comparing pm2.5 values between 25 days before lockdown vs 25 days under lockdown using historical data. Predicted aiq index using different ML models. Plotted graph using seaborn library. This Project’s GitHub Repository

item.title: (Project 4: Sports Analytics) IPl-data-analysis-2008-2019
item.description: found out number of matches win by individual team till 2019. Identify the year, in which kkr win maximum number of matches. Visualize kkr batting & bowling performances using pie chart. This Project’s GitHub Repository

item.title: (Project 3: Bio-informatics) Computational Drug Design
item.description: Used SMILES notation to compute Lipinski’s descriptors, collected the data from ChEMBLdatabase. Performed exploratory Data Analysis, computed molecular descriptors using PADELDescriptorssoftware & prepared (X, Y) data frames. Applied Random Forest Algorithm & for better understanding of accuracy level, plotted a graph using matplotlib library. This Project’s GitHub Repository

item.title: (Project 5: Data Analytics) Sales Insight Data Analysis Project in Power-BI.
item.description: Analysed the Aims Grid approach & checked market-related information from particular SQL database. Plugged mysql database ,with Power-BI& did data wrangling & currency normalization. Built Power-BI dashboard. Created a mobile view of that & access it inside the Power-BI application. This Project’s GitHub Repository
